validCredentials.description: Valid email and password combination. Expected outcome: Successful login.

invalidEmail.description: Invalid email format. Expected outcome: Error message for invalid email.

shortPassword.description: Short password (less than 8 characters). Expected outcome: Error message for short password.

emptyFields.description: Both email and password fields are empty. Expected outcome: Error messages for both fields.

emptyEmail.description: Email field is empty. Expected outcome: Error message for empty email.

emptyPassword.description: Password field is empty. Expected outcome: Error message for empty password.

caseSensitive.description: Lowercase password. Expected outcome: Error message for case-sensitive password.
Uppercase email and password. Expected outcome: Error message for case-sensitive email and password.

validEmailInvalidPassword.description: Valid email but invalid password. Expected outcome: Error message for invalid password.

invalidEmailValidPassword.description: Invalid email but valid password. Expected outcome: Error message for invalid email.

longPassword.description: Long password (more than 8 characters). Expected outcome: Successful login.

specialCharactersInPassword.description: Password with special characters. Expected outcome: Successful login.

mixedCaseEmailAndPassword.description: Mixed case email and password. Expected outcome: Successful login.

whitespaceInEmailAndPassword.description: Whitespace in email and password. Expected outcome: Successful login.

validEmailEmptyPassword.description: Valid email but empty password. Expected outcome: Error message for empty password.

emptyEmailValidPassword.description: Empty email but valid password. Expected outcome: Error message for empty email.
